ARABIC: فَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَعْفُوَ عَنْهُمْ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَفُوًّا غَفُورًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It may well be that Allah will pardon them. Allah is Ever-Pardoning, Ever-Forgiving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: May well hope for the mercy of God; and God is full of mercy and grace.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: maybe Allah shall pardon these, for Allah is All-Pardoning, All-Forgiving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: perhaps God will forgive them; He is All-merciful and All-forgiving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So for such, it is likely that Allah will pardon them; and Allah is Most Pardoning, Oft Forgiving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: These are they whom Allah is likely to forgive them, and Allah is Ever Oft-Pardoning, Oft-Forgiving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So these, it may be, Allah will pardon them, and Allah is Pardoning, Forgiving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: haply them God will yet pardon, for God is All-pardoning, All-forgiving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: As for such, it may be that Allah will pardon them. Allah is ever Clement, Forgiving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God may well pardon them. God is ever-pardoning and ever forgiving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: These: belike Allah will pardon them, and Allah is ever Pardoning, Forgiving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Maybe Allah will excuse them, for Allah is all-excusing, all-forgiving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For these, there is hope that Allah will forgive: For Allah doth blot out (sins) and forgive again and again.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: For these there is hope that Allah will forgive them, and Allah is Ever Oft Pardoning, Oft-Forgiving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Those, Allah may pardon them, He is the Pardoner, the Forgiver.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: These—God may well pardon them. God is Pardoning and Forgiving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: For those it is expected that Allah will pardon them, and Allah is ever Pardoning and Forgiving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [4:99] As for such, perhaps God will pardon them, for God is ever Pardoning, Forgiving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (As for such, it may be) it is a requisite (that Allah will pardon them) that which ensues from them. (Allah is ever Clement) towards the likes of these, (Forgiving) of those who repent amongst them.
